io.github.coolys.config.jcache

Class BeanClassLoaderAwareJCacheRegionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.cache.jcache.JCacheRegionFactory
      • io.github.coolys.config.jcache.NoDefaultJCacheRegionFactory
        • io.github.coolys.config.jcache.BeanClassLoaderAwareJCacheRegionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.hibernate.cache.spi.RegionFactory, org.hibernate.service.Service

    public class BeanClassLoaderAwareJCacheRegionFactory
extends NoDefaultJCacheRegionFactory
    Fixes Spring classloader issues that were introduced in Spring Boot 2.0.3. This allows to use the same classloader for ehcache, both for the Spring Cache abstraction and for the Hibernate 2nd level cache. See https://github.com/coolybot/generator-coolybot/issues/7783 for more information.
    See Also:

      • setBeanClassLoader

        public static void setBeanClassLoader(ClassLoader classLoader)
        This method must be called from a Spring Bean to get the classloader. For example: BeanClassLoaderAwareJCacheRegionFactory.setBeanClassLoader(this.getClass().getClassLoader());
        Parameters:
        classLoader - The Spring classloader
